WO-IMPL-MODULAR-SYSTEM.title: Modular: System Registry Hardening (ID 0 Fix)
WO-IMPL-MODULAR-SYSTEM.instruction_raw: Refactor AgentRegistry and Initializer to handle Agent 0 (Central Bank) as valid and truthy. Ensure system agents are explicitly registered.

WO-IMPL-MODULAR-MARKET.title: Modular: Market Relaxation (Circuit Breaker)
WO-IMPL-MODULAR-MARKET.instruction_raw: Extract ICircuitBreaker logic and implement Dynamic Circuit Breaker with temporal relaxation logic.

WO-IMPL-MODULAR-DB.title: Modular: Persistence Migration (Schema Update)
WO-IMPL-MODULAR-DB.instruction_raw: Implement IDatabaseMigrator in SimulationRepository to handle total_pennies column addition and backfill.

WO-IMPL-MODULAR-LIQUIDATION.title: Modular: Liquidity Bailout (PublicManager)
WO-IMPL-MODULAR-LIQUIDATION.instruction_raw: Implement ILiquidator for PublicManager to use create_and_transfer for escheatment valuation, preventing liquidity stalls.
